attributes.action: STOP THE SENDING OF UNWANTED JUNK MAIL IN THE POST
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: LESS JUNk MAIL, MEANS LESS WASTE, MEANS MORE TREES & MORE OXYGEN, SHOULD HELP WITH THE OZONE LAYER. 9 OUT OF 10 JUNK MAILS END UP IN THE BIN. stop this unescessary waste now

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
